resources.string: Welcome to Xsolla Inventory SDK demo
Inventory SDK allows you to use Xsolla Player Inventory independently from Xsolla In-Game Store and Pay Station.\nWe will show you different ways to add items to your inventory in the tutorial.
In the demo, you can add items to the inventory in one of the following ways:
- Buy items in the web store\n- Redeem a coupon code to get bonus items
Buy items in the web store

1. Go to the web store
2. Log in to the same account as you used for the demo.
3. Buy items. You can use our test cards.
Items you purchased will be available in the inventory.
1. Click the REDEEM COUPON button in the left side menu.\n2. Enter one of our test codes “BONUS2020” or “WINTER2021”\nThe bonus items will be available in the inventory.
